page.title: 06SHILLINGFORD-FARMING
page.content: THE CLIMATE OF THE AREA IS EXTREMELY SUITABLE FOR THE GROWTH OF SOFT FRUITS.SEVERAL OF THE FARMS HAVE A LARGE ACREAGE GIVEN OVER TO STRAWBERRIES,RASPBERRIES,GOOSEBERRIES, BLACKCURRANTS,REDCURRANTS,BLACKBERRIES AND RHUBARB. EARLY VEGETABLE CROPS OR VEGETABLE CROPS THAT ARE SUITABLE FOR FREEZING ARE ALSO GROWN.THE FARMS ENCOURAGE PEOPLE TO PICK THEIR OWN FRUIT AND VEGETABLES QUANTITIES.THIS CUTS DOWN ON LABOUR COSTS AND YIELDS A HIGH PROFIT FOR THE FARMERS. APPLE ORCARDS BOTH SMALL AND LARGE ARE TO BE FOUND IN THE AREA .APPLES ARE SOLD FOR FRUIT OR FOR PRESSING INTO CIDER.
